rows.label: bf09250100_0010
rows.name: ...Hey, you!

rows.label: bf09250100_0020
rows.name:
Could you perhaps be 
Ornella-san's former Blade?

rows.label: bf09250100_0030
rows.name: Ornella? No, I'm...

rows.label: bf09250100_0040
rows.name: That's right! From the Territorial Defense Corps!

rows.label: bf09250100_0050
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf09250100_0060
rows.name:
How nostalgic. 
Back then, I was just a child about this tall.

rows.label: bf09250100_0070
rows.name:
The way you carried that sword on your back...
I looked up to you so much.

rows.label: bf09250100_0080
rows.name:
If you hadn't shown up when you did,
our village would have been...

rows.label: bf09250100_0090
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: bf09250100_0100
rows.name:
The house where you all lived still remains 
on the outskirts of the village.

rows.label: bf09250100_0110
rows.name: House?

rows.label: bf09250100_0120
rows.name: [ML:undisp ][ML:Dash ][ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf09250100_0130
rows.name: ...This long war for independence will soon come to an end.

rows.label: bf09250100_0140
rows.name: But it's not only the war that's ending.

rows.label: bf09250100_0150
rows.name: ...Her life is also drawing to a close.

rows.label: bf09250100_0160
rows.name: And when she dies, so will my time come to an end.

rows.label: bf09250100_0170
rows.name:
Regardless of her death,
I will simply return to my Core as usual

rows.label: bf09250100_0180
rows.name: to await my next awakening.

rows.label: bf09250100_0190
rows.name: Just as I have done countless times before.

rows.label: bf09250100_0200
rows.name:
But will the me who awakens 
then be the same me as before?

rows.label: bf09250100_0210
rows.name:
If the one called God truly exists,
I would like to ask:

rows.label: bf09250100_0220
rows.name: Who am I?

rows.label: bf09250100_0230
rows.name: Where did I come from and where am I going?

rows.label: bf09250100_0240
rows.name:
I hope dearly that this journal will find
its way into "your" hands.

rows.label: bf09250100_0250
rows.name:
I will finally leave behind 
a method for me to remain myself

rows.label: bf09250100_0260
rows.name: a method to engrave the bond with my partner onto this body.

rows.label: bf09250100_0270
rows.name: That method is...

rows.label: bf09250100_0275
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf09250100_0280
rows.name: Wow, it's really run-down, isn't it?

rows.label: bf09250100_0290
rows.name: I heard it's been about 90 years, but...

rows.label: bf09250100_0300
rows.name:
What is it?
Did you remember something?

rows.label: bf09250100_0310
rows.name: N-no... It's nothing.

rows.label: bf09250100_0320
rows.name:
Is that so? That's too bad. 
I wanted to know about the previous you.

rows.label: bf09250100_0330
rows.name: I am... me. I never change.
